title: Francesca baby
creator_credit: Larry S. Elikann, Martin Tahse and Martin Tahse Productions
brief_description: Presents an adaptation of the novel of the same title by Joan L. Oppenheimer, about a teenage girl and her younger sister who try to cope with their alcoholic mother. Shows how the teenage girl joins Alateen and how a series of dramatic events mark the beginning of a new life for the girls.
